bool mysqlnd_qc_change_handler
mixed handler
Sets the storage handler used by the query cache. A list of available storage handler can be obtained from mysqlnd_qc_get_handler. Which storage are available depends on the compile time configuration of the query cache plugin. The default storage handler is always available. All other storage handler must be enabled explicitly when building the extension.
